post_message: Alec Baldwin just trolled Trump again by walking around New York City wearing a “Make America Great Again” hat — with the embroidered logo in Russian.  The timing for Baldwin’s hat couldn’t be better, coming as the president-elect sat down with security officials on Friday who told him the Russians helped him win the election — an assertion Trump flatly denies because it would contribute to the belief that his win is suspect having lost by over 3 million in the popular vote.
